name: Devid come back
description:
This game is one of the last story acts in FNAS 3

It is also made in the style of Visual novel, which is not quite usual for horror games.

And takes 10 minutes to play.

But despite all this, the game turned out to be quite atmospheric and "alive".

Together with David and Cassandra, you have to go through this difficult path...

I understand that I speak in riddles, but this is in order to fully reveal the plot of the entire franchise in part 3.

I can't say anything more, because the game itself is not big.

Have a nice game.)
